writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

setRelaunchIfRunning(boolean).Description: Sets the "relaunch if running" flag. If the flag is set, the receiver application will be relaunched even if it is already running. The flag is not set by default.

setLanguage(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the language to be used by the receiver application. If not specified, the sender device's default language is used.

getLanguage().Description: Returns the language, or null if none was specified.

toString().Description: Returns a string representation of this object.

hashCode().Description: Overridden to return a hashcode of the device ID.

ClassDesc: An object that holds options that affect how a receiver application is launched. See @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#CastApi#launchApplication_E@.
